relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare Botnet Threat Feed for Service Providers
relatedBlades.subtitle: Free proactive botnet identification and visibility to help stop IP abuse
relatedBlades.copy:
![Botnet Threat Feed for Service Providers -Image](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/4FbTNbrq5qiqGwUGCQfB2w/6b56dd9ac3defba6bba6559619aa4aaf/Botnet_Thread_Feed.png)

Cloudflare mitigates DDoS attacks around the world every single day, which means we are uniquely positioned to proactively identify offending IP addresses. Service Providers can sign up to receive a feed of their owned IP addresses that we have seen participate in HTTP DDoS attacks, so they can proactively identify and choose to take action before the next attack occurs. [Cloudflare Botnet Thread Feed for Service Providers](https://blog.cloudflare.com/botnet-threat-feed-for-isp/) will help you to:

- __Save money__ - Blocking botnets and IP abuse helps you to save CPU/bandwidth that was previously being abused for generating DDoS attacks
- __Provide a better experience__ - Your customers, your customer's customers, as well as everyday Internet users, will benefit from early detection and decommissioning of botnets
- __Protect your reputation__ - Don't wait until botnets cause chaos for your customers, get ahead of the curve and protect your reputation by getting ahead of threat actors and removing their ability to carry out DDoS attacks

If you work for an Internet Service Provider and operate your own IP space, join the waitlist and be one of the first to get access to the Botnet Threat Feed
